product_overview: The Campus Placement Management System is a web application that streamlines the entire campus recruitment process by connecting Students, Admins (Training & Placement office), and Companies. It centralizes job postings, applications, assessments, interviews, and placement outcomes, with real-time updates, role-based access control, analytics dashboards, notifications, and resource management optimized for a mobile-responsive web platform.
core_goals: Increase placement process efficiency and transparency through digitization.
Provide reliable, multi-channel communications including push and email notifications.
Enable data-driven decision-making with comprehensive analytics dashboards for admins.
Ensure secure role-based access control for students, admins, and companies to protect data and actions.
Reduce manual coordination efforts by automating notifications and application management.
key_features: Firebase-based Authentication System with roles: student, admin, and company.
Student Profile Management including academic details, skills, documents, and profile completeness tracking.
Job Posting System with detailed eligibility criteria and real-time notifications to eligible students.
Application management workflow with statuses, bulk actions, and resume attachment handling.
Scheduling and Event Management for placement rounds with reminders and notifications.
Push notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging and transactional emails via SendGrid.
Admin Analytics Dashboard using Chart.js for placement trends and reporting.
Resource Library and Announcements for guides, policies, and prep materials.
Gallery for uploading and displaying placement event photos.
Company Portal for posting jobs, reviewing candidates, and providing outcome feedback.
user_flow_summary: Student flow: Sign up/login, complete profile, upload resume, browse and apply for eligible jobs, track application status, receive notifications, and attend scheduled events.

Admin flow: Login, create and publish jobs with eligibility rules, monitor and manage applications, shortlist or reject candidates, schedule interview rounds, send communications, and analyze placement data.
Company flow: Login, post or clone job listings, view and filter applicants, and share selection outcomes.
validation_criteria: Role-based access controls enforced and verified for each user type (student, admin, company).
Successful authentication and session management with Firebase Auth including password reset and verification.
Students can create, complete, and update profiles with document uploads stored securely in Firebase Storage.
Jobs can be posted with eligibility criteria, published, and trigger notifications to appropriate students.
Students can apply for jobs with resume attachment and track application status updates reliably.
Events and scheduling flow functions correctly with notifications for upcoming rounds.
Push and email notifications deliver with >95% success rate for critical events.
Admin dashboards display real-time analytics with accurate data visualizations and export options.
All UI components are responsive and accessible to meet WCAG AA standards.
Security and privacy policies adhered to with consent mechanisms and Firestore rules.
System performance meets p95 page load <2.5s on 4G network conditions.
